alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 18 at 4:26PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band is affecting northern Erie County.... At 420 PM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from Conneaut to North East. This snow band will continue to impact northern portions of Erie County with heavy snow into this evening... HAZARDS INCLUDE... Snow rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Locations impacted include... Erie, North East, Girard, Albion, Wattsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, Lake City, Cranesville, Platea, McKean, Northwest Harborcr and Avonia. This will impact Interstate 90, Interstate 79 north of Edinboro, and Interstate 86. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. &&
